DOC.detailed_description: In recent year , various control study show psychoeducational intervention effective decrease relapse improve outcome bipolar disorder . However , sample often small , compromise statistical power , large variety patient . The investigator therefore test CBT group psychoeducation program + MBCT decrease relapse improve outcomes large sample refractory bipolar I patient mood stabilizer . Patients test recruitment , 6-month follow-up CBT 2-month follow-up MBCT use clinical interview self-report questionnaire . The primary outcome measure efficacy relapse follow-up require either hospitalization , modification treatment HDRS ≥ 16 MRS ≥ 6 . The secondary outcome measure symptomatic functional improvement .
